DataElement.preferredName: Speech Child And Adolescent Grammatical Impairment Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Speech; the exchange of spoken words._A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity._A test that assesses a respondent's knowledge of grammar. It identifies respondents with specific language impairment (SLI) or other categories of language impairment._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Speech; the exchange of spoken words._A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity._A test that assesses a respondent's knowledge of grammar. It identifies respondents with specific language impairment (SLI) or other categories of language impairment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Speech; the exchange of spoken words.

Property.preferredDefinition: A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.:A test that assesses a respondent's knowledge of grammar. It identifies respondents with specific language impairment (SLI) or other categories of language impairment.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
An age group comprised of juveniles between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.
A test that assesses a respondent's knowledge of grammar. It identifies respondents with specific language impairment (SLI) or other categories of language impairment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
